parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering rack and pinion can cause loss of steering control, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities, especially when driving at high speeds or in hazardous conditions.
The failure of the tie rod can cause loss of steering control, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities, especially when driving at high speeds or in hazardous conditions.
symptoms: Tie rod fell out of the rack and pinion

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the steering column can cause loss of steering control, leading to accidents, injuries, or fatalities, especially when driving at high speeds or in hazardous conditions.
symptoms: truck does not stay in the road straight

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the Signal Acquisition Module (SAM) can cause the headlights and turn signals to malfunction, leading to reduced visibility and increased risk of accidents.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Fuel System Failure Leading to Fire
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the fuel system can cause a fire, which can lead to serious injuries, fatalities, and significant property damage.
symptoms: The driver may smell heavy exhaust gases
see smoke and flames coming from beneath the body
and experience a crackling noise coming from behind the firewall.
